data.prayer: Father, help the 1,430 believers in Saint Anthon to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Anthon, Montserrat
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,430 believers in Saint Anthon to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,770 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Saint Anthon, Montserrat.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Saint Anthon, Montserrat, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Saint Anthon, Montserrat to the gospel today.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Plymouth
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Plymouth, Saint Anthon, Montserrat.
Spirit, train the church of Saint Anthon, Montserrat to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 1,430 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Saint Anthon.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 5,200 citizens of the the state of Saint Anthon.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.
